summary: A brief look into Romani culture and Rom (Gypsies) from around the globe as five famous Romani groups tour the USA. The film visits their families at home in Spain, India, Macedonia and Romania.
cast: Maharaja|Esma Redzepova|Taraf de Haidouks|Antonio El Pipa|Fanfare Ciocarlia|George Cruze|Juana|Robert Browning|Johnny Depp|Stevo Teodosievski|Harish|Lucía|Fabián|Kathy|George Eli|Isabel Soffer|Queen Harish
title: When the Road Bends... Tales of a Gypsy Caravan
